data.name: Lonely Birds
data.detailed_description:
A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets (that's right, the pairs of parakeets are pears!) with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other.



The initial challenge is to move the birds without having them block each other from matching. Later you'll find some animals are linked and always try to move together. Add into the mix a springy tree that bounces the animals around and you've got some truly perplexing puzzles.



Already with 85+ challenging puzzles (and plenty more on the way), Lonely Birds offers countless hours of gameplay and fun for puzzle-loving players!



Bring your own ideas to life and play community created levels with our built-in level editor! Head over to the Steam Community Hub to find and share levels.
data.about_the_game:
A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets (that's right, the pairs of parakeets are pears!) with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other.

data.short_description: A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other. It starts simple but grows challenging quickly over the many available levels, all in a pretty, cozy and cute setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
